boot_coverage.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * include this file inside your config.php to get a codecoverage overview of your webapp.
00004  * note: you need the xdebug extension
00005  *
00006  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00007  * @package kata_debugging
00008  *
00009  * Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/>
00010  * Copyright 2007-2009 mnt@codeninja.de, gameforge ag
00011  *
00012  * Licensed under The GPL License
00013  * Redistributions of files must retain the above copyright notice.
00014  */
00015 
00016 if (DEBUG > 1) {
00017     if (function_exists('xdebug_start_code_coverage')) {
00018 
00019         /**
00020          * shutdown function to generate coverage 
00021          */
00022         function kataCodeCoverage() {
00023             $data= xdebug_get_code_coverage(XDEBUG_CC_DEAD_CODE | XDEBUG_CC_UNUSED);
00024             ksort($data);
00025             foreach ($data as $name => & $lines) {
00026                 if (substr($name, 0, strlen(ROOT)) != ROOT) {
00027                     continue;
00028                 }
00029 
00030                 $temp= explode(DS, $name);
00031                 if (in_array('lib',$temp)) {
00032                     continue;
00033                 }
00034                 $shortFile= array_pop($temp);
00035                 $shortDir = array_pop($temp);
00036                 $shortName= $shortDir.DS.$shortFile;
00037 
00038                 if (($shortDir == 'config') || ($shortName == 'webroot'.DS.'index.php')) {
00039                     continue;
00040                 }
00041 
00042                 echo '<br /><h2>'.$shortName.'</h2>';
00043 
00044                 if ($shortDir == 'lang') {
00045                     echo 'skipping... '.$shortDir.' <br />';
00046                     continue;
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 $file= file($name);
00050                 $tdCell = '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">';
00051                 echo '<table style="min-width:100%;border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;">';
00052                 foreach ($file as $lineno => $line) {
00053                     $count= 0;
00054                     if (isset ($lines[$lineno +1])) {
00055                         $count = $lines[$lineno +1];
00056                     }
00057                     if ($count>2) {
00058                         $count = 3;
00059                     }
00060 
00061                     echo '<tr>'.$tdCell.$lineno.'</td>'.$tdCell.'<tt';
00062                     switch ($count) {
00063                         case 0:echo ' style="color:#c0c0c0;"';break;
00064                         case 1:echo '';break;
00065                         case 2:
00066                         case 3:echo ' style="color:#ffe0e0;"';break;
00067                     }
00068                     echo '>'.h($line).'</tt></td></tr>';
00069                 }
00070                 echo '</table>';
00071 
00072             }
00073             unset ($lines);
00074             echo '</table>';
00075         }
00076         register_shutdown_function('kataCodeCoverage');
00077         xdebug_start_code_coverage();
00078 
00079     } else {
00080         kataDebugOutput('You need a current XDebug-Extension!');
00081     }
00082 }
